GenericColorDescID: Color when not aiming at something in particular.
LengthDescID: How long each 'line' in the crosshair is (Heist restart required).
ThicknessDescID: How thick each 'line' in the crosshair is (Heist restart required).
CasingCrosshairDescID: Keep the crosshair visible while in casing mode.
TasedCrosshairDescID: Keep the crosshair visible while in casing and civilian mode.
DownedCrosshairDescID: Keep the crosshair visible while in bleedout.
LMGIronSightsDescID: Enables hiding of the crosshair when aiming down sights with LMGs. Always enabled when using Restoration Mod.
MovementEffectsDescID: Make the crosshair grow while you are moving, sprinting, or airborne when these don't impact the actual accuracy of the gun.
ShootingEffectsDescID: Make the crosshair grow while you are shooting when it doesn't impact the actual accuracy of the gun.
